title: People.on.Sunday.1930.1080p.Criterion.Bluray.DTS.x264-GCJM
description:
People.on.Sunday.1930.1080p.Criterion.Bluray.DTS.x264-GCJM

=======

aka
Menschen am Sonntag

Years before they became major players in Hollywood, a group of young
German filmmakers (including eventual noir masters Robert Siodmak and
Edgar G. Ulmer and future Oscar winners Billy Wilder and Fred Zinnemann)
worked together on the once-in-a-lifetime collaboration People on Sunday.

This effervescent, sunlit silent, about a handful of city dwellers (a cast of
nonprofessionals) enjoying a weekend outing, offers a rare glimpse of
Weimar-era Berlin. A unique hybrid of documentary and fictional storytelling,

People on Sunday was both an experiment and a mainstream hit that would
influence generations of film artists around the world.
